abstract: Wal-Mart’s former chief, Lee Scott, has landed at private equity firm Solamere Capital.
snippet: Wal-Mart’s former chief, Lee Scott, has landed at private equity firm Solamere Capital.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart‘s former chief executive, Lee Scott, has taken a position at the private equity firm Solamere Capital.

headline.main: Former Wal-Mart Chief Joins P.E. Firm
